resources.string: No more ads permanently and \n make more room for your goals.
Support the developers and \n gain access to all the PRO features to come.
Please help the development of the app by going premiumSKU. Thank you!

- Remove ads forever
- Gain access to all the PRO features (to come)
- Unlimited number of goals
- Higher priority for your feedback and feature requests
To start using the Premium features please restart the application.
Unfortunately the free version of the app cannot be used without showing ads!
Data successfully restored. The app needs to be restarted for the changes to take effect.
Export all your data to a single file so you can restore it at a later time. This can be useful especially if you are planning to change your device.
You can restore the state of the app to a previous state by using a backup file. Warning: By restoring the application data you will lose all your modifications made after the backup!
By using this App you agree and consent to the bellow data policy.
Your privacy is very important to us, and we take it seriously. Please read our Data Consent information below and let us know if you have any questions or other feedback regarding it.

The app uses advertising to provide the content free of charge. When you use the app your device automatically sends certain information to our advertising partner, Admob. This information includes, for example, the name of the app, the device type, and the advertising ID. The information gathered is solely used to provide our advertising partners with the bare minimum of information they need to provide their services and combat click fraud.\nYou will be asked for consent before seeing any advertisements. The consent will be presented only if needed, when an advertisement would be displayed for the first time. You can change your consent settings any time on the Settings/Ads section.

AdMob is an advertising service provided by AdMob Google Inc. Please read this overview of how they use information from sites or apps that use their services: https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites \nPersonal Data collected: Unique device identifiers for advertising. For example, Google Advertiser ID . \nPlace of processing: United States

In the app we use analytics (usage and error data) in order to understand how users engage with our app and how to improve them and fix potential errors. When you use the app your device automatically sends certain information to our analytics partner Google Firebase. The information gathered includes, for example, the device type, the session length, and interactions with various user interface elements (buttons) in the app. The analytics data collected is anonymous and is not personal data. At first startup of an app we generate a random unique identifier which does not contain any personal information, and cannot be used to uncover any such information.\nBecause no personal data is sent to the analytics partner, no consent is required. Your identity cannot be traced back from the data that is sent.
Boros Csaba, 1193 Budapest, Hungary \nContact: boros.csaba94@gmail.com \nIf you have any question concerning our usage of personal data please contact us.

Under GDPR we must ask your consent for displaying personalized ads. (P.S. Non-personalized ads are more annoying). Please take a look at our list of Ad technology providers we share data with: https://boroscsaba94.github.io/AdTechnologyProviders
Notifications keep you on-schedule, help you to meet your deadlines and don`t forget your goals.
If you cannot find you currency please contact us!

To enable your data to be synchronized you must enable synchronization and log in with the same account on all you devices you wish to keep synchronized. Please note that by enabling synchronization you must agree to have your data uploaded to the Firebase Cloud servers!
Download and use all of our apps and get premium membership in all of them!
